name: What have you done
description:
Game made with love for the GGJ 2014 〔´∇｀〕

Description:

A cooperative local multiplayer game, in which one player explores a strange world while the other talks with EERIE characters.


Credits:

Adrien Carta : Lead Developper / Game Designer

Julie Robert : Lead Graphist / Game Designer

Paul Maurer : Developper / Game Designer

Grégoire Carabeufs : Developper / Game Designer

Camille Giraudeau : Sound Designer / Music
